targets.expr: ( (node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="3.10.225.255:9100", job="$job", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"} - node_filesystem_avail_bytes{instance="3.10.225.255:9100", job="$job", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"}) / node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance="3.10.225.255:9100", job="$job", mountpoint="/", fstype!="rootfs"} ) * 100
